article_title: Amid Turbulence At Walgreen, Wasson To Exit As CEO

article_metadata.description: Walgreens (WAG) today said long-time president and chief executive officer Greg Wasson will “retire shortly after the close of the second step” of its merger with Alliance Boots at the end of this month. It's a turbulent time for Walgreen, which is under pressure to cut costs as it consolidates various [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
